caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. DARYL FIELDS, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: No. 511 EAL 2002, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 2nd day of April, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
